<<<<<<< HEAD
Norfolk drollery, or, A compleat collection of the newest songs, jovial poems, and catches, &c. by the author, M. Stevenson. Stevenson, Matthew, fl. 1654-1685.
[8], 126 p.
Printed for R. Reynolds ... and John Lutton ..., London : 1673.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Published earlier, 1665, with title: Poems; and later, 1685, with title: The wits, or, Poems & songs on various occasions.
=======
Norfolk drollery, or, A compleat collection of the newest songs, jovial poems, and catches, &c. by the author, M. Stevenson. Stevenson, Matthew, fl. 1654-1685.
[8], 126 p.
Printed for R. Reynolds ... and John Lutton ..., London : 1673.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Published earlier, 1665, with title: Poems; and later, 1685, with title: The wits, or, Poems & songs on various occasions.
John Lutton
R. Reynolds
